attributes.action: Sack Fabio Capello... Give The Job To Redknapp
attributes.additional_details:
Fabio Capello has taken the reigns of the England Nationa Team, he cant even speak the language properly and is useless at utilising the talents we have at our disposal. We must act fast before our English 'Golden Era' squad detiriate. We must act before the EURO's.

Here is Capellos lates excuse “The higher resolution today makes it much harder for the players, every pass has to be pixel perfect – there is no room for error in today’s high-definition game”, the £6million-a-year coach
